:toggle-line-through.label: t__Strike-through
:toggle-line-through.description: t__Applies a horizontal line through the middle of the text.

:toggle-overline.label: t__Overline
:toggle-overline.description: t__Applies a horizontal line above the text.

:toggle-sub.label: t__Subscript
:toggle-sub.description: t__Small text that is positioned below the baseline.

:toggle-sup.label: t__Superscript
:toggle-sup.description: t__Small text that is positioned above the baseline.

:toggle-tt.label: t__Teletype
:toggle-tt.description: t__Applies monospace highlighting to the text.

:toggle-u.label: t__Underline
:toggle-u.description: t__Applies underline highlighting to the text.
